name: Swipe the Doge
description:
★ The Ultimate Doge game has just arrived :) ★

Test your Doge Swiping skills in this insanely fun game!

How to play:
1. Touch the screen and don't let go!
2. Swipe any type of Doge.
3. Keep swiping that same Doge.
• Lose Mojo = Game Over :(
• High Score = Eternal Glory :)

Reach 100 score to see something cool!

★ Enjoy, and share with your friends! :) ★

Do you have what it takes, to be a Doge Master?

Created with Esenthel Game Engine http://www.esenthel.com/
